title: Fitness Coach Website
challenge: The client had a basic website that wasn't generating leads. Despite having paid ads running, the conversion rate was under 2%. They needed a landing page that would turn traffic into consultation bookings.
solution: We created a CRO-first landing page with clear value propositions, social proof, and strategic CTAs. The design emphasized before/after transformations and included a simplified booking flow.

design: Conducted competitor analysis of top-performing fitness landing pages
Created wireframes focused on conversion flow
Designed high-fidelity mockups with strong visual hierarchy
seo: Keyword research targeting 'personal trainer [city]' and related terms
Optimized on-page SEO (title tags, meta descriptions, H1-H6 structure)
Optimized Core Web Vitals for 95+ PageSpeed score
Set up Google Analytics 4 and conversion tracking

testimonial.quote: Echo Web completely transformed my online presence. The new landing page pays for itself every single month.
testimonial.author: Sarah Johnson

title: E-Commerce Store Redesign
challenge: The store had decent traffic but poor conversion rates. Shopping cart abandonment was at 78%, and the mobile experience was particularly problematic with high bounce rates.
solution: We redesigned the entire shopping experience with a mobile-first approach, streamlined checkout process, and implemented trust signals throughout. Added product filtering, quick view functionality, and optimized product pages for conversions.

design: Conducted user testing to identify friction points
Redesigned product pages with better imagery and clear CTAs
Added trust badges and security indicators
Implemented persistent shopping cart and wishlist
seo: Optimized product descriptions for long-tail keywords
Implemented product schema markup for rich snippets
Improved site speed to sub-2 second load times
Set up enhanced e-commerce tracking in GA4

testimonial.quote: Our revenue has doubled since the redesign. The new site not only looks amazing but actually converts visitors into customers.
testimonial.author: Jessica Martinez

title: Law Firm Website & SEO
challenge: The law firm had zero online presence and was relying entirely on referrals. They needed to establish credibility online and start generating qualified leads through organic search.
solution: Built a professional, trustworthy website with practice area pages optimized for local search. Created an attorney bio section, case results page, and resource center with legal guides. Implemented comprehensive local SEO strategy.

design: Created professional brand identity and style guide
Built attorney profile pages with expertise highlights
Added client intake forms with smart routing
seo: Local SEO targeting practice areas in three counties
Created 20+ location + practice area landing pages

testimonial.quote: We went from invisible online to receiving multiple qualified leads every week. The ROI has been exceptional.
testimonial.author: Robert Smith
